title: What font it is ? Please help
author: mateusz0817

comments.content: Was about to say ' [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071731/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura)' but I think it's rather [Century Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071731/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/century-gothic).
Century Gothic is this what i looking . Thank u very much !!
